s: ^Not too bad, Rashad! How are you?
^Hi Rashad! Doing well, how can I help you today?

Chat1: ^Rashad?Neutral "I've been trying to kickstart some new programs, but the paperwork never ends. It kinda feels like I'm stuck in quicksand."
^Rashad?Neutral "I don't mean to complain, but this week, it all feels pretty overwhelming."

s: ^That's rough. Is there any way I can help?

Chat2: ^Rashad?Neutral "I know, right? Between us, the board isn't always emphathetic when it comes to what the community actually needs. There's a big disconnect, there. On top of that, the library has been pretty hectic these days."

s: ^That's a lot to manage. Is there any way I can help?

QuestIntro: ^Rashad?Smiling "Well, now that you mention it. The library has been super slammed lately. I finally got approval to hire some help, and I'm looking for someone to fill that open position in the YA section."

s: ^Hmmm, I may be able to help. Can you tell me more?
^I think I may be able to help you with that.

QuestDetails1: ^Rashad?Neutral "Sure! It's perfect for someone who knows 'young adult literature' - you know, some good old 'YA Lit." Ideally, I'd find someone with great people skills who doesn't mind multi-tasking."

s: ^That's good to know. Can you tell me more about the position?
^I can ask around. How soon do you need to fill the position?

OptionalQuestDetails1: ^Rashad?Neutral "It's probably a shot in the dark but if I can set up interviews by next week, that would be amazing."
^Rashad?Neutral "If I wasn't swimming in admin work, I'd probably have a chance to properly look for a good candidate."

s: ^I may have someone for you.  Is there anything else I should know?
^I think I can make that happen!

QuestDetails2: ^Rashad?Neutral "This role would be part-time, maybe two or three shifts a week. The person will need to learn the young adult section, so they can help reshelve books and run the help desk."
^Rashad?Neutral "Also, I'd love someone who could take over storytime on Saturdays. We have one session in the morning and one in the afternoon to support as many families as possible."

s: ^Sounds good.  Is there anything else I should keep in mind?

OptionalQuestDetails2: ^Rashad?Neutral "I mean, it'd be perfect for a student. They can study when they staff the help desk. Oh, they'll need a solid resume, too."
^Rashad?Neutral "We can't just let anybody waltz up in here, hah!"

s: ^That's reasonable. You can count on me, Rashad!

QuestAcceptance: ^Rashad?Smiling "Thanks for having my back! If you find someone, just have them reply to the posting on the library's website."

s: ^Of course, Rashad! You can always count on me.

Goodbye: ^Rashad?Smiling "Perfect. If we can get even a single application it would mean the world. Cheryl and I are hoping to take the kids on a roadtrip during the next school break, and having someone trained would make that less stressful. I've have to head out but I'll catch you later?"
